Name: MIBT
About the game: Help the government agents in black thong to end the alien threat and the invasion of the machines. Remember the old arcades of the 90s alone or in the company of a friend. Pixelart, platform, difficulty and fun. 1 or 2 players. Individual and cooperative. Gamepad compatible. Demo available.
